resource.escalationreason: Analyst notes: Data leakage confirmed. Outbound email successfully made it past email gateway.

resource.name: Symantec DLP- Outbound email with unencrypted PII
resource.description:
An outbound email sent by {{vars.data.email_details.sender}} was not encrypted and contains an attachment with PII.

PII type: {{vars.data.pii_type}}

resource.name: Outbound Unencrypted PII Detected
resource.description:
An outbound email sent by {{vars.steps.Create_DLP_Alert.senderEmailAddress}} was not encrypted and contains an attachment with PII.

PII type: SSN

resource.name: Counsel user about appropriate PII practices
resource.description:
Counsel user about appropriate PII practices.

Have the user re-take PII training module.

resource.content: This Alert has been escalated to Incident #{{vars.steps.Create_Incident.id}}

arguments.data:
{
  "time": "2019-06-17T23:22:57.100Z",

routes.name: Add comment to alert -> Assign Task
Escalate Alert -> Add comment to alert
Create DLP Alert -> Create Incident Record

resource.escalationreason: Analyst notes: Outbound traffic was blocked, but the fact that it happened at all is enough to consider this host likely compromised. Recommend quarantining the host as a precaution and sending Forensics to take a look.

resource.content: This Alert has been escalated to Incident #{{vars.steps.Create_Incident.id}}

resource.name: Quarantine Host
resource.description: Execute the "Isolate Host" playbook to quarantine the host

Thanks,

 

Tony Stark

System Engineer

801 Amar Neptune | Pune, MH 411045 (India)

 

www.fortinet.com

resource.name: Pull network data and investigate

resource.name: Outbound Connection Attempt Using Known C2 Port
resource.description: PaloAlto firewall {{vars.data.host}} has blocked an outbound connection using a common C2 port.
